articles.description: Ella Toone scores late winner as England come from two goals down to beat the Netherlands at Wembley Stadium in crucial tie.
articles.title: Toone's late winner caps incredible England comeback

articles.description: India beat a much-changed Australia by 20 runs to complete a T20 series victory in Raipur.
articles.title: India beat Australia to seal T20 series win

articles.description: Ronnie O'Sullivan keeps his hopes of a record-extending eighth UK Championship crown alive with a courageous 6-5 comeback victory against Zhou Yuelong in York.
articles.title: O'Sullivan survives Zhou scare to reach UK semis

articles.description: Scotland will be relegated to Women's Nations League B despite Erin Cuthbert's stunning equaliser against Belgium.
articles.title: Scotland relegated to Nations League B after draw

articles.description: Wales are relegated from the top tier of the Nations League as they are beaten 2-1 by Iceland in Cardiff.
articles.title: Wales relegated from Nations League top tier

articles.description: Williams confirm American Logan Sargeant will remain with the team next season, completing the 20-driver grid for 2024.
articles.title: Williams retain Sargeant to complete 2024 F1 grid

articles.description: An application by ex-players to sue as a group will be considered next year, the High Court hears.
articles.title: Rugby concussion: Wales' Henson and Charvis named in lawsuit

articles.description: The Republic of Ireland maintain their perfect run in the Nations League with a scrappy 1-0 win over Hungary at Tallaght Stadium.
articles.title: Republic beat Hungary to maintain perfect record

articles.description: The Rugby Football Union made a profit of £4m in 2022-23 despite three Premiership clubs going out of business because of financial struggles.
articles.title: RFU makes £4m profit despite clubs in administration

articles.description: Ilias Chair sets up both QPR goals as the Championship strugglers add to Preston's woes with victory at Deepdale.
articles.title: Substitute Chair inspires QPR to victory at Preston
